alert.note: Alert for Northeast Suffolk; Southeast Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued April 18 at 4:11AM EDT until April 18 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EDT THIS MORNING... ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM EDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the Freeze Warning, near freezing temperatures as low as 30. Temperatures lower in the Pine Barrens. For the Wind Advisory, east winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Northeast Suffolk and Southeast Suffolk Counties. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, until 8 AM EDT this morning. For the Wind Advisory, from 8 PM this evening to 6 AM EDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops and other sensitive vegetation.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.
